mapper.sql: wihsd.ht_stocktaking_det_id, wihsd.ht_stocktaking_id, wihsd.contract_code, wihsd.pallet_code, wihsd.material_id, wihsd.storage_id, wihsd.book_inventory, wihsd.counted_quantity, wihsd.profit_loss_quantity, wihsd.profit_loss_rate, wihsd.delivery_rate, wihsd.price, wihsd.profit_loss_amount, wihsd.`status`, wihsd.remark, wihsd.organization_id, wihsd.create_user_id, wihsd.create_time, wihsd.modified_user_id, wihsd.modified_time, wihsd.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , sm.material_code,sm.material_name,sm.material_desc, bo.organization_name,bo.organization_code, su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, ss.storage_name,ss.storage_code, swa.warehouse_area_id,swa.warehouse_area_code,swa.warehouse_area_name, sw.warehouse_id,sw.warehouse_code,sw.warehouse_name, spm.product_model_code,spm.product_model_name from fantech_imes.wms_inner_ht_stocktaking_det wihsd LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON wihsd.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON wihsd.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.smt_material sm ON wihsd.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_tab bt ON bt.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_product_model spm ON bt.product_model_id = spm.product_model_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_storage ss ON wihsd.storage_id = ss.storage_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_warehouse_area swa ON ss.warehouse_area_id = swa.warehouse_area_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_warehouse sw ON swa.warehouse_id = sw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON wihsd.organization_id = bo.organization_id
and date_format(wihsd.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and sm.material_code like CONCAT("%",#{materialCode},"%")
and sm.material_name like CONCAT("%",#{materialName},"%")
and wihsd.contract_code like CONCAT("%",#{contractCode},"%")
and wihsd.pallet_code like CONCAT("%",#{palletCode},"%")
and wihsd.delivery_rate = 0
and wihsd.delivery_rate > 0
and wihsd.delivery_rate < 0
and wihsd.stockist_id=#{stockistId}
and wihsd.status=#{status}
order by wihsd.modified_time desc
